item.title: How i ip bann!? :d
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

if your ip banning 2 people[br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 07:13:18 PM[/size][hr][code] java.net.Socket s = clientListener.accept();
s.setTcpNoDelay(true);
String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName();
if(clientListener != null) {
if (connectingHost.startsWith(“ns1.eurower.net”)) {

					misc.println(connectingHost+": Checking if server still is online...");
				} [/code]

thats how you ip ban that one guy

Read full topic

item.title: How i ip bann!? :d
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

ok this is what it should look like for i[ banning one person

[code] java.net.Socket s = clientListener.accept();
s.setTcpNoDelay(true);
String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName();
if(clientListener != null) {
if (connectingHost.startsWith(“c211-31-43-186.rivrw5.nsw.optusnet.com.au”)) {

					misc.println(connectingHost+": Checking if server still is online...");
				} [/code]

for ip banning 2 people it looks like

[code] java.net.Socket s = clientListener.accept();
s.setTcpNoDelay(true);
String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName();
if(clientListener != null) {
if (connectingHost.startsWith(“c211-31-43-186.rivrw5.nsw.optusnet.com.au”) || connectingHost.startsWith(“CPE-72-128-104-130.wi.res.rr.com”)) {

					misc.println(connectingHost+": Checking if server still is online...");
				} [/code]

Read full topic

java.net.Socket s = clientListener.accept(); s.setTcpNoDelay(true); String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName(); if(clientListener != null) {

under there might be a few ips already there this is my full list

item.title: How i ip bann!? :d
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String s = command.substring(6);
int i = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(s);
if(i != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[i] != null)
{
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i];
PlayerHandler.kickNick = s;
sendMessage(c.connectedFrom+" is now banned.");
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
 bw.write(c.connectedFrom);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error banning ip.");
 }
  }

}
}[/code]

Read full topic

 System.out.println(playerName+" failed to logon because their ip is banned");
 appendToLR(playerName+" failed to logon because their ip is banned")
}

item.title: How i ip bann!? :d
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

go into character files and fnd the name you want to ip ban
open it up and look for

character-lastconnection =

then there should be an ip adress on that line
copy it and go into data files
then open the file bannedip’s
and paste the ip yu copyed at the bottom or top of the list
then save it and ur done

Read full topic
